action.command: /give @s minecraft:blaze_rod[minecraft:custom_data={"custom_item": true,"id": "generic:move_to_look_at"},minecraft:consumable={animation:"none",consume_seconds:10000,sound:{sound_id:ambient.nether.basalt_deltas.heavy_click1,range:0}},item_name= "目光跃迁杖",lore=[{text:"传送到你看向的位置"}],rarity="epic"]

/give @s minecraft:breeze_rod[minecraft:custom_data={"custom_item": true,"id": "generic:pick_up_entity"},minecraft:consumable={animation:"none",consume_seconds:10000,sound:{sound_id:ambient.nether.basalt_deltas.heavy_click1,range:0}},item_name= "生物压缩杖",lore=[{text:"将你看向的生物打包带走"},{text:"最远只能带走前方目视6格的生物"}],rarity="epic"]

/give @s minecraft:end_rod[minecraft:custom_data={"custom_item": true,"id": "generic:fuck_entity"},minecraft:consumable={animation:brush,consume_seconds:10000,sound:{sound_id:ambient.nether.basalt_deltas.heavy_click1,range:0}},attribute_modifiers=[{type:"entity_interaction_range",id:"mines_pack:no_entity_interact",amount:-1,operation:"add_multiplied_total",slot:"offhand"},{type:"block_interaction_range",id:"mines_pack:no_block_interact",amount:-1,operation:"add_multiplied_total",slot:"offhand"}],tooltip_display={hidden_components:["attribute_modifiers"]},lore=[{text:"- 将这根末地烛放在副手，然后你就可以艹其他生物了",italic:false,color:white},{text:"- 注意只有原本就能繁殖(除了村民)才能艹",italic:false,color:white},{text:"- 为了防止意外的交互，放在副手后你将不能与方块/生物",italic:false,color:white},{text:"进行其它交互(比如打开马的装备栏)",italic:false,color:white},{text:"- 该末地烛在放到地上后会变成普通的末地烛，不能再用来",italic:false,color:white},{text:"艹生物",italic:false,color:white}],rarity="uncommon"]
